s: 5 days ago - On July 16, 1995, Amazon opened as an online bookseller, selling the world's largest collection of books to anyone with World Wide Web access. t: The Complete Guide to Amazon’s Private Label Brands | Pattern
s: Amazon introduced its first in-house brands—AmazonBasics and Pinzon, which both sell everyday household goods—in 2009. Only in the past few years, however, has the company ramped up its focus on private label creation. In 2017, there were just 30 private label brands in operation on the site compared to more than 100 today. Some of Amazon’s brands are widely recognizable, like Echo or Kindle...
